Description: Rectangular wooden writing-board, 2 perforations on upper edge for suspension, remains of dowels at the opposite edge. Bears Coptic school text on both sides.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.149-150)
Brunsch 1982-83 / Acht Holztafeln aus dem Britischen Museum, London (no. 7, 40-41.)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir John Gardner Wilkinson
